title: ChatGPT integration for Telegram
description: Deploy a Telegram bot that uses the ChatGPT API to chat with users.
introduction: Welcome to the ChatGPT Telegram Bot setup. I'll guide you through the steps to deploy your bot.

system_prompt.title: System Prompt
system_prompt.description: Optional custom system prompt for your bot. You can set one if you like.
system_prompt.confirmation: Would you like to set a custom system prompt? (Yes/No)

cf_account_id.title: CloudFlare Account ID
help_image: Log in to your Cloudflare account (or create a new one).
Copy the id from address pane
cf_account_id.error_message: Please enter a valid Cloudflare account ID.

cf_wrangler_key.title: CloudFlare API Key
help_image: Log in to your Cloudflare account (or create a new one).
In the top right corner in the menu select - My Profile
Go to your API Tokens page.
Choose "Edit Cloudflare Workers" from the API token templates
For the "Account Resources" dropdown select All accounts. For the "Zone Resources" select All zones
cf_wrangler_key.error_message: Please enter a valid Cloudflare API key.

openai_sk.title: OpenAI API Key
openai_sk.description: OpenAI API key. Find this in your OpenAI account under API settings.
openai_sk.error_message: Please enter a valid OpenAI API key that starts with 'sk-...'.
help_image: Sign up for a OpenAi account https://platform.openai.com if you don't already have one. Skip the onboarding process.
Open this page https://platform.openai.com/api-keys here. And create a new API key.
Copy the API key to your clipboard

tg_token.title: Telegram Bot API Token
tg_token.description: Telegram Bot API token. Get this from the BotFather on Telegram.
tg_token.help_text: To create a new Telegram bot, message @BotFather on Telegram and use the /newbot command.
tg_token.error_message: Please enter a valid Telegram Bot API token.
help_image: Use the /newbot command to create a new bot.
Copy the API token to your clipboard.

deployment_confirmation: Do you want to proceed with deploying your Telegram bot with the provided details? (Yes/No)
completion_message: Your Telegram bot is now deployed! You can access it at [Bot URL]. For any changes, you can restart this setup process.
